Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "
from models import SeasonalNaiveModel
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

# Create test data with a gap \(missing January\)
dates = pd.date_range\(''2023-02-01'', ''2024-12-01'', freq=''MS''\)  # Missing Jan 2023
volumes = np.random.uniform\(100, 200, len\(dates\)\)

data = pd.DataFrame\({''date'': dates, ''volume'': volumes}\)
print\(f''Training data months: {[d.strftime\(""%Y-%m""\) for d in dates[:4]]}...''\)

model = SeasonalNaiveModel\(\)
model.fit\(data\)

# Forecast Jan 2025 - should trigger fallback since no Jan in training
predictions = model.predict\(periods=1\)
print\(f''Prediction for {predictions[""date""].iloc[0].strftime\(""%Y-%m""\)}:''\)
print\(f''  Forecast: {predictions[""forecast""].iloc[0]:.2f}''\)
print\(f''  Used fallback: {predictions[""used_fallback""].iloc[0]}''\)
print\(f''  Model fallback flag: {model.last_prediction_used_fallback}''\)
print\(f''  Fallback months: {model.fallback_months}''\)
")

import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, r''C:\\Users\\noah.howell\\OneDrive - Alimentation Couche-Tard\\Documents\\Code\\fuel-forecasting''\)
from models import SeasonalNaiveModel
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

# Create test data with a gap \(missing January\)
dates = pd.date_range\(''2023-02-01'', ''2024-12-01'', freq=''MS''\)  # Missing Jan 2023
volumes = np.random.uniform\(100, 200, len\(dates\)\)

data = pd.DataFrame\({''date'': dates, ''volume'': volumes}\)
print\(f''Training data: Feb 2023 to Dec 2024 \(missing Jan\)''\)

model = SeasonalNaiveModel\(\)
model.fit\(data\)

# Forecast Jan 2025 - should trigger fallback since no Jan in training
predictions = model.predict\(periods=1\)
print\(f''Prediction for {predictions[""date""].iloc[0].strftime\(""%Y-%m""\)}:''\)
print\(f''  Forecast: {predictions[""forecast""].iloc[0]:.2f}''\)
print\(f''  Used fallback: {predictions[""used_fallback""].iloc[0]}''\)
print\(f''  Model fallback flag: {model.last_prediction_used_fallback}''\)
print\(f''  Fallback months: {model.fallback_months}''\)
")
